Title: The Tasty Boys
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Stephen Basilone, Annie Mebane, Lacey Marisa Friedman (story)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: As Adam and Barry team up in a rap supergroup a la the Beastie Boys, Beverly presses Murray to let her remodel their kitchen.
